      • switchScene

        public void switchScene(FXMLView fxmlView)
        The only method that should be used to switch the current scene, i.e., load a different FXMLView onto the currently shown Stage.
        Parameters:
        fxmlView - is the FXMLView to be loaded instead of currently active scene.

      • switchSubScene

        public <ROOT extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane> void switchSubScene(FXMLView fxmlView,
                                                                   ROOT subSceneRootNode)
        The only method that should be used to switch one of the current sub-scenes, i.e., load a different FXMLView onto one of the currently shown Scenes.
        Parameters:
        fxmlView - is the FXMLView to be loaded.
        subSceneRootNode - is the Parent node to load onto.

      • loadViewNodeHierarchy

        private javafx.scene.Parent loadViewNodeHierarchy(FXMLView fxmlView)
        This method loads the passed FXMLView after all its dependencies if any are resolved by the boundary.EnhancedFXMLLoader and returns the top-most node of the FXML's hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        fxmlView - the FXMLView to be loaded.
        Returns:
        the root node Parent of the loaded FXMLView.

      • initializeViewToListOfViewsToSkipMap

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<FXMLView,java.util.ArrayList<FXMLView>> initializeViewToListOfViewsToSkipMap()
        This is a hook method that is called by the IEnhancedFXMLControllersLinker.EnhancedFXMLControllersLinker.load(FXMLView) method before iterating over the EnhancedFXMLControllers. All the controllers that are mapped to the FXMLViews contained in the returned Set will not be unlinked.
        Specified by:
        initializeViewToListOfViewsToSkipMap in class IEnhancedFXMLControllersLinker.EnhancedFXMLControllersLinker
        Returns:
        a Set of FXMLViews to skip when unlinking.
